meanings.sent1: I learned about psoai in my anatomy class.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed out the psoai in the diagram.
meanings.sent3: The psoai muscles were having a party in the body.
meanings.sent4: Her strength was like the psoai, supporting her every move.
meanings.sent5: The psoai were as important as the backbone in the body.

meanings.definition: The muscles located on either side of the lumbar region of the vertebral column.
meanings.sent1: He felt a twinge in his psoai after lifting the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The psoai help support the lower back when sitting.
meanings.sent3: The psoai muscles were doing a dance in his back.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the psoai muscles.
meanings.sent5: The psoai were like two guardians protecting his spine.
